invention-title: Preparation method and application of InSe/Au heterojunction composite material
一种InSe/Au异质结复合材料的制备方法及应用

abstract.p: The invention discloses an InSe/Au heterojunction composite material with a structure that Au nanoparticles are loaded on the surface of an InSe nanosheet as well as a preparation method and application of the InSe/Au heterojunction composite material. The preparation method comprises the following steps: firstly, dissolving sodium borohydride, and mixing the InSe nanosheet with the sodium borohydride solution under the condition of violent stirring; and dropwise adding a chloroauric acid aqueous solution, carrying out ultrasonic treatment, and fully stirring to obtain the InSe/Au heterojunction. InSe/Au heterojunctions with different Au contents are prepared through a strategy of changing the amount of a chloroauric acid aqueous solution. Experimental results show that the InSe/Au heterojunction has enhanced electro-catalytic performance compared with a single InSe nanosheet, and the performance is optimal when the Au content is 5wt%. The first principle is that the standard free energy of the hydrogen evolution reaction is calculated, and the InSe/Au heterojunction obtains the highest-quality HER Gibbs free energy (about-0.59 eV). The enhancement of the performance is due to the fact that a charge channel formed by Au-Se bonds can effectively improve the transfer capacity in the charge transfer and catalysis process, and Au nanoparticles can provide additional H < + > adsorption sites.

本发明公开了一种结构为Au纳米颗粒负载于InSe纳米片表面的InSe/Au异质结复合材料及其制备方法和应用。其制备方法为：首先将硼氢化钠溶解,并在剧烈搅拌的情况下将InSe纳米片与硼氢化钠溶液混合。然后滴入氯金酸水溶液并进行超声处理，充分搅拌后得到InSe/Au异质结。通过改变氯金酸水溶液的量的策略制备了不同Au含量的InSe/Au异质结。实验结果显示InSe/Au异质结具有增强的电催化性能相比于单一的InSe纳米片，并且Au含量为5wt％时性能达到最佳。第一性原理计算了析氢反应的标准自由能，InSe/Au异质结获得了最高质量的HER吉布斯自由能(约‑0.59eV)。其性能的增强归因于Au‑Se键形成的电荷通道可以有效提高电荷传输和催化过程中的转移能力，并且Au纳米颗粒可以提供额外的H+吸附位点。
